constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 21 (Thursday, February 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GOHMERT:
H.R. 811.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 1
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18 of the Constitution.
[Page H387]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: To require all individuals in the executive branch to comply with Executive orders imposing mandates on the people of the United States.
